review: Dr Dhwani, is an excellent dentist. She is an absolute professional,  and extremely competent. Besides her professional attributes, Dr Dhwani is very kind, compassionate, understanding, patient and always helpful. She will ensure she alleviates your pain and shows her caring ways through her follow ups. Synergy has an excellent team of doctors .

review: This is my second time treatments for implant for full mouth  I am happy as they finished in minimum time with full satisfaction as I have to go to USA .All Drs are well experienced and very friendly My special thanks to Dr Vipin Mahurkar,Dr Pallavi ,Dr Dhwani Kapadia and their all staff for their best services

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Dr. Dwani is doing quality work with micro level checking of implants teeth refixing for final level. In my case, she was particular that i should not get any pains while fixing implants frames with teeth.  Very comfortable feeling for last 15 days time with Synergy Clinics.
I got my permanent  teeth after waiting period of around 6 months after fixing my implants .
Now i am very happy that i can eat like earlier when i was vety young.
Thanks once again to all synergy clininc staff.
Thanks to Dr. Vipin and Dr. Pallavi for their support and efforts.
reply_text: Thank you so much for your warm feedback and kind words. It was a pleasure to treat you. üòÄ

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Dental Fillings,Post and Core,RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Dental Implant Fixing,GIC Tooth Fillings,
review:
Dr. Dhwani is very professional and friendly too in her approach. Patient feel very nice because of her willingness to understand the problem from grass root level. She is takes initiative to explain the pros and cons of the treatment and the necessary precautions thereby educating the patient about dental treatment and health.
She takes decision basis complete analysis and diagnosis and then she treat with a right method. 
She takes the ownership and accountability of her treatment and I found her best doctor to consult.
I wish her a very successful journey in her profession and God bless her. 
Thank you Dr. Dhwani. üòä You are an amazing dentist! Keep up the good work üëè üôå üëç üëå üí™
reply_text: Thank you so much for your warm feedback! It was our pleasure to treat you.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I, Smita Shivalkar, went through surgery performed by Dr. Vipin Mahurkar, Periodontist, assisted by Dr Dhwani Kapadia.  They performed the surgery of implants in place of missing teeth. The procedure was totally painless thanks to good anaesthesia. One thing i had noticed that Dr Dhwani has a very light hand which gave me the satisfaction of being in safe hands. With a  few follow-up appointments Dr Dhwani was working patiently on me to help me replace the lost teeth as well as my smile and make me comfortable whenever i needed to.  Thank you to her patiance & ability to handal the patients well. I would recommend.
reply_text: Thank you so much for your kind words and immense patience on chair, mam! It's been a pleasure to treat you!

review: ** ******** ************ ***** ** ************ I had an appointment with her regarding implant treatment. She examined my case very carefully and briefed me about the course of treatment. She patiently replied to all my queries and cleared my doubts. I was deeply moved by her dedication and devotion towards work, as she understood my issue and gave me appointment in a very short notice of time managing  between her packed schedule. * ***** **** *** *** ** *** **** ****** **** **** ************** ************* *** *********
reply_text: Thank you so much for such a warm response Mr. Negi!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Dental Implant Fixing,Surgical Extractions of Teeth,
review: Treatment is still on under Dr. Dhwani Kapadia, Dr. Pallavi Mahurkar, and Dr. Vipin Mahurkar, and I can say that I have had a pleasant experience so far. They make me comfortable and ensure that I am told clearly about the treatment progress. Definitely recommended. Thank you.
reply_text: Thank you so much for your warm feedback, Mr. Kamat! It was a pleasure to treat you.
